resources.string: Install a web browser to open this URL.
Thanks to you, applications can be maintained and features are added regularly.
As an early contributor, you will have access to all the features of the new open source Kunzisoft apps that will be deployed in the future, so keep this app installed to enjoy your benefits.

To further improve the user experience, KeePassDX and KeePassDX Pro are merging into the same KeePassDX app in the next version.\n\nOf course, you keep all the advantages already acquired, but you have to re-download the KeePassDX app to reintegrate your settings.
